items.title: HG Infra Engineering shares rise 2% on winning project in Odisha
items.description: HG Infra Engineering Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 1,880.00 and a 52-week low of Rs 921.05 on 16 July, 2024 and 07 April, 2025, respectively. The share price declined more than 39 percent in the last one-year.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Zydus Lifesciences, CE Info Systems Nazara Tech, Sterlite Technologies, HG Infra, Hindustan Copper, Angel One in focus on 12 June
items.description: Stocks to watch, 12, June: Stocks like Cyient, ICICI Bank, Maruti Suzuki India, Canara Bank, Kellton Tech Solutions, GMM Pfaudler, Titagarh Rail Systems, Zydus Lifesciences, CE Info Systems Nazara Technologies, Sterlite Technologies, HG Infra Engineering, Hindustan Copper, and Angel One will be in focus on June 12.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty above 25,100, Sensex flat; Asan Paints, ONGC up, Paytm down 10%
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The S&P 500 ended lower on Wednesday, with investors spooked by Middle East tensions, while a tame inflation report calmed concerns around tariff-driven price pressures and traders awaited more details on China-U.S. trade talks.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The dollar weakened against all group of 10 peers after President Donald Trump said he plan to send  letters to the the trading partners in next one or two weeks setting unilateral tariff rates ahead of a July 9 deadline.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade CG Power Industrial, Ashok Leyland, HCL Technologies, BPCL, Biocon, Lupin, GAIL and others on June 12?
items.description: The market may remain rangebound in the upcoming session until it decisively surpasses the previous day’s high. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Three individuals settle case with SEBI in Brightcom Group Limited case
items.description: SEBI had received complaints against the BGL and during investigation found that there were misstatements and irregularities in the Financial Statements of BGL. SEBI had passed final order against the company, promoters and others in February this year. In the order penalties and debarment of 1-5 years was also imposed.

items.title: Electricity Futures soon on 2 key exchanges, NSE also receives SEBI Approval to launch E-Futures
items.description:
A calibrated and phased approach will ensure both market integrity and investor confidence. It is crucial
for the spot and futures electricity markets to evolve in tandem to create a virtuous cycle of liquidity and
stability. A financially settled futures market will allow participants to hedge their risks effectively, while
a robust day-ahead spot market will ensure reliable price discovery.

items.title: Hindustan Zinc announces Rs 10 interim dividend for FY26; shares tumble 3%
items.description: Hindustan Zinc share price: The shares of the Vedanta Group company have now snapped a four-day gaining streak, which was triggered by the sharp rally in silver prices.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on June 11
items.description: Top gainers and losers today: Benchmark indices closed with muted gains, with Sensex ending the session 123 points higher at 82,515. Nifty 50 meanwhile rose 0.15 percent to close at 25,141.

items.title: Hold DCX Systems; target of Rs 321: Deven Choksey
items.description: Deven Choksey recommended hold rating on DCX Systems with a target price of Rs 321 in its research report dated June 10, 2025.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty fails to hold above 25,200, Sensex up 124 pts; IT stocks shine
items.description: HCL Technologies, Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, ONGC were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers included Shriram Finance, Power Grid Corp, Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Bharat Electronics.
